name: catachresis
text: It is a remarkable transformation. Pat had his dick electrocuted.

name: chaesar
text:
Pat had the dick electrocuted out of him.

The same dick that makes him charge his friends money to borrow things they don't want to borrow.

name: foetus_punch
text:
You can take the dick out of the man, but you will never take the man out of the dick.

...what?

name: njury
text: Neutering/castrating.

name: jthm_guitarist
text: It changes a man.

name: dirtyantaeus
text: A comment left by dirtyantaeus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by johnnybaverage, AlEwing, PurpleRose, RBisme)

name: dropkickpikachu
text: No way dawg I been electrocuted before. Changes your perspective. I mean, in a way it's like you die. But boy howdy are you ever reborn.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: so the pikachu avatar has sentimental meaning?

name: hawaiian_robot
text: That comment is a really big contrast to your avatar.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: i'm an enigma, brah

name: pogo
text: "Electrocuted" means to DIE from eletricty.  You were shocked, that's it.

name: boredom_man
text:
Hey, the Intarwebs say Dirty Antaeus and Pogo are right, even though I thought they were wrong! That's a neat concept!

Drop Kick Pikachu is correct insofar that waking up on the floor with a brand new exit wound and a boner the size of Apollo's is rather perspective-changing, though.

name: i_love_kate
text:
Is this true.

Is it true that a strong electrical current will give you an erection.

name: boredom_man
text: Absolutely. But there's no arousal . Don't go asking me specific questions about the human nervous system, but after my bad shock, I was dazed, disoriented, experiencing gaps in motor use, and had a bigger boner than I've ever had before or since, presumably triggered by something south of the conscious or subconscious mind. Hell of boundary-challenging.

name: i_love_kate
text: Man, maybe a certain part of your brain just got a pretty big dose. Might not be a reliable thing.

name: i_love_kate
text: (He said, hoping to stop Pogo before he got any ideas on how to save money on Viagra.)

name: pogo
text: So if I just wrap some aluminum foil around my Johnson, and then jigger this here nine-volt batt ... OUCH!  FUCK!!

name: cracklewater
text:
"Electrocution" is my favourite 20th Century marketing-word portmanteau.

It's a snazzy combination of "electric" and "execution", first coined to describe the purpose of the electric chair.

Why settle for stuffy old executions when you have the wonder of ELECTRO-cution to kill people?

name: awko
text: Pyrocution?

name: twotonturkey
text: yeah I got electrocuted by a Ms. Pacman machine once.  When I came to I had pissed my pants and my initials were in the high score.  True story.

name: mikebox
text: HA! aw, fantastic.

name: pa_ass_nts
text: I got zapped by an electric fence by mistake once. I was insulated by my sneakers, but someone came up a poked my in the back with a stick before I realised what I was touching.

name: jdhenry105
text: Did you really have to add "by mistake" to that sentence?

name: pa_ass_nts
text: In the context for this story, yes, I do. My younger brother flat out refused to believe me, and decided to find out for himself. The difference between being zapped intentionally or by mistake was a Big Thing in my childhood.

name: puguglypress
text: It electrocuted his DICK.

name: anomalous3
text: A man who charges guests to use his bathroom deserves to have his dick electrocuted.

name: agika
text: That should be the minimum penalty.

name: agika
text:
"Smells like someone sauteed a raccoon"
When a pithy and accurate simile is required, just call Roast Beef.

name: n00b
text: i LOVE Beef's face in that panel.

name: lechatbotte
text: So what does sauteed raccoon smell like, and how does Beef know? (!).

name: heccibiggs
text: Times were tough growing up.

name: centipede_damascus
text: How would he carry an amulet in his pocket? He doesn't wear pants!

name: theoneyouwant
text: shirt pocket? marsupial?

name: nessotron
text: I don't think it needs to be 100% logical, it being set in a hyperfictional world and all. Jesus.

name: honesttom
text: Same way he was able to unzip.

name: theoneyouwant
text: my vote of 4 beefs is soley for "sauteed raccoon"

name: tinhand
text:
Roast Beef seems to be looking at the camera in panel 3, which I liked.

Noam Chomsky = an American linguist, theorist, and political activist.
Noel Shempsky = A Star-Trek nerd who works at the radio station in the hit comedy series 'Frasier'.

name: terebikun
text: I actually commonly confuse Noam Chomsky with Klaus Nomi of novelty music and your avatar fame.  And I'm a Linguistics major.  I've had a lot of embarrassing conversations with my professors.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
i do miss that show.

yay, Fraiser.

name: petro
text: Wouldn't a Chomsky video have only three minutes of him and then three of Zinn, or might Dr Chomsky be ACTUALY talking about lingustics for a change?

name: notgodot
text:
Man Zinn is awesome so I don't know how that is a bad thing.

Chomsky is basically like one of those academics who is all heck of unsuited for the discipline he's actually trained in but used the post-sixties homogenization of the humanities and social sciences that resulted from the migration of continental philosophers into the aforementioned fields immensely. It's just that unlike most of them his actual areas of interest relate to explicit constructs instead of implicit ones.

name: tinhand
text: This reminds me of the time I made someone borrow FF7 from me. Even though that game rules, and I didn't make them pay for it, I still give myself a lame on principle

name: jyuu
text: Pure love for Beef's "what is that smell" face.

name: dasilodavi
text: A comment left by dasilodavi was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by EM2, rowboat, Cracklewater, Lumus, Jesus, idsyen, last_tuesday, nutmeg, hellofditties, kenyot, stormagnet, RedSalesperson)

name: redsalesperson
text: That's exactly what Pat would have said.

name: dasilodavi
text:
Post-It exposition sucks.

That work better?

name: zem
text: I wouldn't go off on a rant like this but I agree and it is also why I don't think the great outdoor fight is as fantastic as people say it is (it is good but those "AND SO ..."s take away from it)

name: rowboat
text: All rodents are featureless.

name: ovenface
text: lagomorphs, too!

name: mattylite
text: Allright, you finally made me look up that word.  I was kind of dissapointed, I thought it was gonna be like some mixture of mongoloid and maladroit and that sort of thing.

name: achilleselbow
text: Dude, wtf. Just because a chick was dumb enough to get knocked up doesn't give her the right to go traipsing all over the road whenever she pleases. I fully agree with the old Pat regarding this matter.

name: idsyen
text: Pat has a real problem with personality-altering spells and curses, doesn't he?

name: atticusonline
text: A...different nice than "Nice" Pete.

name: heccibiggs
text: I just saw your new avatar for the first time here and it caused me to go "WHAAAAAT" in a completely out-loud manner.

name: atticusonline
text: What's funny is that I'll change my avatar eventually and the future generations of achewoodians will have no idea what we're talking about.

name: heccibiggs
text:
Okay but for now WHAAAAT

Also what's the animated thing at the bottom all about?

name: atticusonline
text:
It is the corruption of dkskradley's GIF.

The avatar symbolizes the 4 best posters on assetbar.

You are...The Syndicate.

name: tekende
text:
I...wow. Thanks.

My god, is this what achieving something feels like

name: atticusonline
text:
Your posts have received so many chubbies that you are now all one collective being.

Please feel free to remove your clothing.

name: tekende
text: Mr. Bunny completely hates clover.

name: radchillies
text: it was a real turning point in my life when I could read about a cat's dick being electrocuted, activating a magic talisman that he keeps on his person, in a pocket that doesn't exist, which subsequently turned him into an upstanding  citizen and have no qualms whatsoever.

name: kickstart
text:
Nice Pat totally reminds me of Steve Dallas, post-Gephardtization (or was it Dolezation)
Excepting of course Pat kept his iconic glasses on .

name: wilbur
text: The amulet Pat was carrying may have actually been a bolo tie ring he got in Taos, according to Ray . (Scroll to the last letter to read the details)

name: mikeronomicon
text: I used to do right-of-way for power lines and I got a nice four-pulse once. Knocked me the fuck out, which sucks since I had a running chainsaw and was 30 feet up in a tree. Woke up with boner the size of a main mast and a new perspective on life.

name: mikeronomicon
text: Oh yeah, I still had all my limbs when I came to as well. That part of the story is important. To me anyway.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: that is good to know.

name: belgand
text: I desperately want to feed clover to a happy bunny now.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
once upon a time my father got his brother to pee on an electrical fence.

this brother is still alive but has MS like my dad who is in heaven now.
